mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_SELL_OUT_DETAIL_SPECIAL (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
sell_out_no ,
ass_card_no ,
price ,
now_depre ,
now_manage_depre ,
add_depre ,
add_manage_depre ,
add_depre_month ,
cur_money ,
fore_money ,
sell_price ,
dispose_income ,
dispose_tax ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{sell_out_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{now_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{now_manage_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_manage_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_depre_month,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{cur_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{fore_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{sell_price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{dispose_income,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{dispose_tax,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)

INSERT INTO ASS_SELL_OUT_DETAIL_SPECIAL ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , sell_out_no , ass_card_no , price , now_depre , now_manage_depre , add_depre , add_manage_depre , add_depre_month , cur_money , fore_money , sell_price , dispose_income , dispose_tax , note
) select t.* from(
select #{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.sell_out_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.price}, 0 price,
#{item.now_depre}, 0 now_depre,
#{item.now_manage_depre}, 0 now_manage_depre,
#{item.add_depre}, 0 add_depre,
#{item.add_manage_depre}, 0 add_manage_depre,
#{item.add_depre_month}, null add_depre_month,
#{item.cur_money}, 0 cur_money,
#{item.fore_money}, 0 fore_money,
#{item.sell_price}, null sell_price,
#{item.dispose_income}, 0 cur_money,
#{item.dispose_tax}, 0 dispose_tax,
#{item.note} null note
from dual
)t
mapper.select:
SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.sell_out_no, a.ass_card_no, b.ass_id, b.ass_no, b.ass_brand, b.ass_spec, b.ass_mondl, b.fac_id, b.fac_no, a.price, a.now_depre, a.now_manage_depre, a.add_depre, a.add_manage_depre, a.add_depre_month, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, a.sell_price, a.dispose_income, a.dispose_tax, a.note FROM ASS_SELL_OUT_DETAIL_SPECIAL a
left join ass_card_special b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.ass_card_no = b.ass_card_no where a.group_id = #{out_group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{out_hos_id} AND a.copy_code in (${out_copy_codes}) AND a.sell_out_no in (${sell_out_nos})

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, sell_out_no, ass_card_no, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, add_depre_month, cur_money, fore_money, sell_price, dispose_income, dispose_tax, note FROM ass_sell_out_detail_special WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sell_out_no = #{sell_out_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, sell_out_no, ass_card_no, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, add_depre_month, cur_money, fore_money, sell_price, dispose_income, dispose_tax, note FROM ass_sell_out_detail_special WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sell_out_no = #{sell_out_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
